title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 160.3 - Designation of fiscal officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 160.3 - Designation of fiscal officer

State Regulations
(a) The Director of Personnel, Department of

Motor Vehicles, Swan Street Building, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12228, shall be the fiscal officer. (b) The fiscal officer shall make payroll records available for inspection and
provide copies of such, upon application by any person, including bona fide
members of the news media as required under section 88(1)(g), (1)(i) and (10)
of the Freedom of Information Law upon a form prescribed by the Comptroller of
the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
160.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
